divs: Sighting Detailsi am a courier .this is the second of 3 events which i have witnessed in the past 6 months.i am a navy vet.aircraft carrier during korean conflict.catapult crew flight-deck.many night operations. i was near lancaster,pa and saw a blue green object moving from west to east .too slow to be a meteor. saw it for about 5-6 seconds.it maintained course did not lower.triangular in shape and as large as a jumbo jet.my reactions on all three separate sightings was.WOW!all different objects all different colors. i was traveling north on pa 222.
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around March 10th 2011
